channel.title: 100 errors on compiling?!
channel.description:
Ok so I don't know what I did to make this happen.. I have 100 errors on my compiler. Can someone explain how to fix them? Allstar 317 Picture is on photobucket. PLEASE CLICK THE LINK IF PICS DONT LOAD!!
[img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/wtfomfg_zps8f917d98.png.html[/img]
http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/wtfomfg_zps8f917d98.png.html
[url=http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/wtfomfg_zps8f917d98.png.html]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/wtfomfg_zps8f917d98.png.html[/url]

item.title: 100 errors on compiling?!
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Cant you see this?

if(command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) [b]{[/b] String titles = ""; 
            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player]-";
                            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Player-Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Donator]- ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 5) {
                titles = "[Helper]- ";
            [b]}[/b]</blockquote>

Just add another }
And just for you to know this command only check your rights and use a new string, its not sending a yell message or something

Edit; Now i see this lol:

[quote=“Flame_, post:6, topic:518991”]Think: if every opening bracket needs a closing bracket, and 100 errors means that there is a missing bracket, what could you fix in your code to resolve those errors?
[size=32pt]Hint: add a closing bracket at the end of your code.[/size][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors on compiling?!
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:6, topic:518991”]Think: if every opening bracket needs a closing bracket, and 100 errors means that there is a missing bracket, what could you fix in your code to resolve those errors?
Hint: add a closing bracket at the end of your code.[/quote]

I think I did…? If I didn’t where would it go? I am not the best coder, obviously…
:s
-------------EDITED-------------
I know it is a little bit hard to read, but here is a 30 second YouTube video showing what it does.

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors on compiling?!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Think: if every opening bracket needs a closing bracket, and 100 errors means that there is a missing bracket, what could you fix in your code to resolve those errors?
[size=4pt]Hint: add a closing bracket at the end of your code.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors on compiling?!
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

I was coding in “yell titles” because I dont like how it says
“mod cody - hi”
I wanted it to say “[Owner]Mod Cody - hi”
This is the code

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player]-";
                            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Player-Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Donator]- ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 5) {
                titles = "[Helper]- ";
            }[/code]

I did fix the first error - and I still got 100 errors.

–
I know what some people might be thinking.

Donator and helper playerrights are higher than owner rights. I made it so that only 1-3 player rights can use staff commands.

----------EDITED BELOW------------
I am not sure if it matters but someone else said they thing those yell titles are for Delta. I am using Allstar 317. Can someone help me make the yell titles for my source? please…

Read full topic
